https://tmrev.io/movie/74485-A Man Named Pearl 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/AlPVww4rKuKyJrKI96vYmXdtOH6.jpg Man Named Pearl tells the inspiring story of self-taught topiary artist Pearl Fryar. It offers a message that speaks to respect for both self and others, and shows what one person can achieve when he allows himself to share the full expression of his humanity. A Man Named Pearl
